content.title: Intro
content.content:
22 Northmoor Road

Map


Loading map...

22 Northmoor Road was the home of the Tolkien family for four years, from 7 January 1926 to 14 January 1930, until they "decided to move in over the fence" according to John and Priscilla Tolkien in The Tolkien Family Album.[1]
